This seems to be a concurrency problem.. Could you specify steps to reproduce?

I have a CDT project in my workspace. If the "build (if required) before launching" option is on, the project is always gets rebuilt when I start a debug session. The debug sessions have nothing to do with any project at all. (BTW do you know why this is happening?)
At some point I started to get this exception very consistently when the build was running. I switched the option off and it disappeared. 
I have tried to reproduce it now by switching the option on, the project gets rebuilt, but the exception is not thrown anymore.
